extendedInfo.description: A919Tool: Instant boost for your RAM and other useful toolsThis is an alternative app to Smart RAM Booster, Rebooter, Sd-booster, Screen-off and lock, Torch, EasyTouch, Screenshot-It, SMS Toast, and AdrenalineBoost V3/V6 Supercharger's !fastengineflush.sh application/scripts.this is a minimalist and lightweight app, no ads, no bloatwares.  Just simply your phone's bestfriend.â For Rooted devices only âThis app is custom built for the MyPhone A919 Duo Android SmartPhone (Mobistel Cynus T2, Micromax A110 Canvas 2, MTK6577).  Works also for other devices, only toggling of capacitive LED button lights feature is not fully tested.âââ Features âââââ HyperAxlr8: Instant boost for your RAM.â 1 Click RAM Booster.â Small memory consumption only 5.1Mb, unlike other RAM boosters that consumes 50-60Mb in RAM.â This is NOT yet another task killer application, it's a totally different app feature that reclaims RAM without killing running apps and services (frequently killing tasks and services causes battery drain).â Replacement for AdrenalineBoost V3 and !FastEngineFlush.sh from V6 SuperCharger scripts.â No need for flashing via CWM or running via Terminal/Console.ââ Nitrous Oxide Service (NOS): HyperAxlr8 Overlay button.â Boost RAM whenever, wherever.ââ HyperAxlr8 Scheduler: user friendly version of V6 SuperCharger's Flush-O-Matic (FOM)â Boost RAM @ pre-defined intervalsââ Capacitive LED buttons: Toggle for turning off/on Capacitive LED button lights.â Saves your phone's precious battery juice.ââ SMS Count Overlay: Provides SMS Notification, can be used with any launcher.â Notification for received SMS in any desktop of your launcher.â Option to set SMS refresh intervals in app's settings.â Has widget support you can use in your homescreenââ Screenshot: Why waste your energy pressing the tedious vol-down+power button for a screenshot.â Easily capture awesome screenshots of your phone.ââ Screen Off: Helps reduce abrasion of your phoneâs power button.â Has an Overlay button so you can turn off your screen using any desktop of your launcher.â To enable screen off feature, app must be given device admin permission to lock screen. Go to Settings>Security>Device Administrators.ââ SD Card booster: Improves the performance of your sdcard.â Info about this here: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1010807ââ Flashlight: Use your device's camera LED / flash as a torch.â Has widget support for easy access.ââ Power Controls: Use the app to reboot, shutdown, turn off screen, softboot, and reboot to recovery.â Has widget support for easy access.ââ Quadrant I/O-nizer: For those folks who likes to brag a high quadrant score (placebo).â Run your Quadrant standard / advanced app after activating and see your benchmark score soar.ââ Autorun: Start overlays and sdcard cache on boot with notification in toolbar.ââ Ads Free!To Uninstall:1. turn off all overlays2. go to Settings>Security>Device Administrators, then deactivate A919Tool.3. you can now uninstall the app in Settings>Apps.Credits: Logo Artwork by SirEden Sosakeywords: ram booster, booster, memory, optimize, battery, saver, sd, LED, flashlight, reboot, recovery, free, cache, ice cream sandwich, jelly bean, memory cleaner, speed up, android optimizer, android booster, optimization, widgets, FOM, V6 supercharger, sdcard, pinoy, philippines

reviews.title: Very Good Update!
reviews.comment: Clean master + Greenify + The Great \"A919 tool\"  = Vroooom 310 free ram! Great update make my A919 super smooth and saves battery with the capacitive button off. Keep up the good work sir edwin :)
